# withUnsafePointer(_:)

**Instance Method**

Invokes the given closure with a pointer to the given argument.

## Declaration

```swift
func withUnsafePointer<R>(_ body: (UnsafeRawPointer) -> R) -> R
```
title: withUnsafePointer(_:)
